details.publicNotes: The clank and clack of bones reveals the location of this skeletal perversion of death. The sound of a spinning sling is heard as its bottom jaw lowers revealing the most horrible of smiles.

description.value: For every other creature with this ability that has missed a target since the start of the attacking creature's last turn, they get a +1 circumstance bonus to their attack roll. Add this bonus last, and it cannot turn a hit into a critical.

Strike an enemy with full hit points. On a hit, they are filled with the cold dead weight of unresponsive bones. They gain weakness 5 to bludgeoning until the end of the skeleton slinger's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.world.ponyfinder-bestiary-effects.Item.H9c83JfpLzlQhCob]{Effect: Stone of the Living}
